text: @realDonaldTrump Ok, what the crap are you doing? Innocent people are being hospitalized  to fight for racist cops throughout your country, which is increasing COVID-19 infection everywhere. But here you are, filing a lawsuit on Twitter because they disagree with you?! Ridiculous...
